mean_cn: v. 容纳；使适应；顺应；向…提供住处（或膳宿）；给…提供方便
mean_en: to provide room for (someone); to provide a place to stay and sleep for (someone)
word_etyma: ac使 + commodate适应 → accommodate 使适应，容纳
short_phrase: The hotel room can accommodate two people.
sentence: The hotel room can comfortably accommodate two travelers.
sentence_trans: 这酒店的房间能够舒适地容纳两位旅客。
